pull.title: gui: hide HD & encryption icons when no wallet loaded
pull.body:
This PR takes care of removing (hiding) the HD wallet and encryption icons when no wallet is loaded.

Fixes #17927

rename.from: gui: hide HD icon when no wallet loaded
rename.to: gui: hide HD & encryption icon when no wallet loaded

events.body: ACK 486f51099ff4e68b67c5bb7ea428c56f3ea1bd55 - tested that this fixes #17927. Thanks for following up so quick.

comments.body: This in the wrong place, should be in `BitcoinGUI::removeWallet` - then it will also work if you open the console and call `unloadwallet`.
Just a nit: shouldn't this line be above the comment?
This seems obviously broken... See PR #18007
